effect_entries.effect: For the next three turns, all Pokémon on the user's side of the field have their original Speed doubled.  This effect remains if the user leaves the field.
effect_entries.short_effect: For three turns, friendly Pokémon have doubled Speed.

flavor_text_entries.flavor_text:
The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.

The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.

The user whips up a
turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed
of all party Pokémon
for three turns.

Génère une rafale de vent qui augmente la
Vitesse des Pokémon de l’équipe pendant 4
tours.

The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon
for four turns.

The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed of all party Pokémon
for four turns.

はげしく　ふきあれる
かぜのうずを　つくり　４ターンの　あいだ
みかた　ぜんいんの　すばやさを　あげる。

세차게 불어대는
바람의 소용돌이를 만들어 4턴 동안
같은 편 모두의 스피드를 올린다.

Génère une rafale de vent qui augmente la Vitesse
des Pokémon de l’équipe pendant 4 tours.

Anwender erzeugt einen Wirbelwind,
der die Initiative aller Pokémon im Team
für vier Runden steigert.

Crea un fuerte remolino que aumenta la Velocidad
de los Pokémon de tu equipo durante cuatro
turnos.

Chi la usa scatena un turbine che aumenta
la Velocità di tutti i Pokémon della squadra
per quattro turni.

The user whips up a turbulent whirlwind
that ups the Speed stat of the user and
its allies for four turns.

激しく　吹きあれる
風の渦を　つくり　４ターンの　あいだ
味方　全員の　素早さを　あげる。

はげしく　ふきあれる
かぜのうずを　つくり　４ターンの　あいだ
 かた　ぜんいんの　すばやさを　あげる。

세차게 불어대는
바람의 소용돌이를 만들어 4턴 동안
같은 편 모두의 스피드를 올린다.

刮起猛烈的強風，
在４回合內
提高我方全體的速度。
